titleStmt.title: A reformed catechism. The first dialogue in two dialogues concerning the English Reformation / collected for the most part, word for word out of Dr. Burnet, John Fox, and other Protestant historians ; published for the information of the people in reply to Mas William Kings answer to D. Manby's considerations &c. ; by Peter Manby.
titleStmt.author: Manby, Peter, d. 1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
